Name: The Expedition
About the game: 'The Expedition' is a first person open world survival game based on a remote island in the bermuda triangle. Build yourself a base, discover many beautiful locations, treasures and find out about the islands mysteries. But be sure to prepare yourself by crafting weapons consumables and other gear, as wild animals and mystical creatures rule over this land. If your searching for a more casual survival game with less focus on grinding and more focus on exploring shooting and building 'The Expedition' could be the right game for you. Current feutures *Singleplayer *Multiplayer *Hunting and gathering *Crafting *Dynamic base building *Finding and trading treasures *Exploring *Swimming *Planting *Mining and refining ores *Hunger health and stamina management *Day night cycle *Musicplayer *textnotes About Us: Hi there, we Gamenight Studios (Mattis & Remo) are proud and excited to present you our biggest project yet THE EXPEDITION. Please keep in mind that this is an early acces game developped by two people.
